column3: “I don't understand the negative reviews. THC was 27 point something%! CBD 0.3%. Nice body buzz and euphoric cerebral high, very introspective, a great balance you would expect from a hybrid. The high THC % was noticeable. Great genetics like Chemdawg and OG Kush”

“I enjoyed smoking Secret Recipe in my bong last summer, but never got around to writing a review.  So a few days ago, I picked up an 8th at my favorite shop to give it another go.  After one bowl, my anxiety was through the roof, and I got into an argument with my loved ones.  The issue of the argument wasn't  my fault, but my anxious state didn't help matters.  I gave it another try on another day and was able to en...”
“This is some magic here. shoots me like a rocket into space...loving every minute of it." Comes on hard like sour pebbles strain
column4: or a Tyson punch. Feeling really good
column5: but see how too much magic would curse some peeps. I wouldn't do back to back bowels
column6: unless I was looking to get 2-d animated.”"

column3:
“If you like Sour Diesel, and long clean highs you should try to get into some of this. 

Potent, and pretty tasty. It is a bud that can roll with whatever your 
choice of activity is. Though it would be a shame to doze off o this one.”
“Giggly, high marks for a strain to watch BBC Peep Show...”

“Very good, strong high. As someone with anxiety issues this strain was a bit hard on me. It gave me a panic attack and I found it difficult to smoke an entire bowl. The taste wasn't as great as I thought it'd be either. The taste is there though, and it's faintly sweet. All in all it has an amazing high and is worth the risk of anxiety.”
“Awesome hybrid. A feel good but functional high. Relaxing. This is a good toking alone strain.”
“super nice strain, leaves me feeling happy and comfortable with a little body buzz. i normally clench my teeth because of stress but this strain helped me relax enough not to”

“Don't know how anyone couldn't like this bud. Its got so many different flavors and strains and its super sticky. Sometimes different bowls and hits taste different. Smoke more than 1 gram and you'll be feeling it.”
“i really like the sample i got from cannabis and glass. taste its sweet and skunky and i would prefer this to sour d any day because its smoooth and no heavy eyes. great taste and effect”

“One of my favorites, very functional, and a clean taste and high. It's a hard hitter but in the best of ways, one bowl is all you need. Very relaxed and happy, great for anxiety as well. IF YOU FIND IT, GET IT!!”
“super nice strain, leaves me feeling happy and comfortable with a little body buzz. i normally clench my teeth because of stress but this strain helped me relax enough not to”

“This is by far some of the better weed I've had in a min. 
The body and mind high that I got was a great relaxing calming, with a uplifting feeling. Almost like a wright had been lifted off me...It had kind of a earthy taste at first then it became sweet with a bitter kinda sour flavor smell.”
“I found it to be a very slight body high without any heady effects what so ever... I figured out the secret... It's not as great as you might think given the name and mystery behind it”
“Really enjoy this strain. Got it in a cartridge. Great flavor with a relaxing body high and  has a clean focused head high.”
“I love this strain so much. It almost reminds me a little of headband! Super frosty and potent.”
“enjoyed it but was underwhelmed by the hype. tasty and ok high”
“I totally get the whole 70s California surfer dude vibe. This is how they all felt. Mellow mellowly mellowist melly mell”
“Good stuff here”
“strong high and surprise new taste with every hit will smoke it again”

“This strain made me feel like I was having a heart attack and then afterword I unearthed some repressed thoughts and had a breakthrough and bawled my eyes out, realizing I need to talk to my father more.”

“this strain sparked my creative side and has a very euphoric high. I have to say it's been making me rather hungry lol. the taste of this strain is mild to me and has a slightly sweet flavor to it.. All in all i would recommend this to anyone who likes a strong high that you can still function properly on!”
“Stony and relaxing / so-so for back and neck pain.”
“Smells really good and gave me a light high. I wasn't floating or anything but it's really peaceful.”
“Amazing”

“This strain is by far my favorite. I love how I get super motivated and creative towards my hobbies. After a good amount of time  of staying productive, I sit for the rest of my high and play video games. I don't think as much like other strains make me, but I do space out a little. I recommend this strain to anyone who hasn't smoked it yet.”
“Very happy euphoric feeling.  Puts you in a dreamy, happy, good place.  You don't get sleepy, and you are still pretty functional.  You get relaxed and smiley.  Love this strain!”
“Nice high. Pretty balanced. Very sticky. Skunky smell.”

“It was an okay high but I was looking for a giggly, talkative experience and ended up more on the mute, sleepy end of the spectrum. I didn't dislike it but it definitely wasn't what I set out for in the first place.”
“awesome taste great high”

“Had this before as a concentrate and enjoyed a mild, happy cerebral buzz with intuitive thoughts.  I bought some flower by Natural Mystic Farms hoping for similar effects.  Instead I was completely zonked out after one small bowl.  I felt heavy and couldn't keep my eyes open.  I had planned on doing a few things before bed, but passed out instead.”
“One of my favorite hybrid strains. It’s been great for my depression and relaxes my body enough to help ease some aches and pains. I come back to this one often.”

“Honestly, I didn't love it. Did it get me high? Yes. Yes it did. Was I paranoid? Yes. Yes I was. The first time I thought it might be me, maybe I wasnt in a good mood - but the whole ounce was the same. Might do in a pinch, but it would have to be a pretty tough pinch before I chose this.”
“bomb diggity one of my new favorites really good for my anxiety”

“Beautiful fat, dense, dark evergreen, Super Sticky nugs, combined with complex flavors to match, of spicy sweet and earthy with a florally undertone, making 'Secret Recipe' the quintessential connoisseur strain to preferably savor slowly in either an ice bong, spliff or honey blunt.

'Secret Recipe' is a chill mood type of smoke so turn on some Smooth Jazz, The Quiet Storm or put on some seasonal Christmas tunes, and...”

“Beautiful fat, dense, dark evergreen, Super Sticky nugs, combined with complex flavors to match, of spicy sweet and earthy with a florally undertone, making 'Secret Recipe' the quintessential connoisseur strain to preferably savor slowly in either an ice bong, spliff or honey blunt.

'Secret Recipe' is a chill mood type of smoke so turn on some Smooth Jazz, The Quiet Storm or put on some seasonal Christmas tunes, and...”
“First off this strain is POTENT" as well simply you may identify OG hints. 50/50 hybrid leaves you with a high that for myself lasts 2-3 hrs
column5: not that we're all alike (take into account and use with ease.) Great taste of citrus
column6: berry comes on strong but easy on the exhale.

column1: A strain I would not hesitate to smoke again.
Props to: Golden Tree Productions - Lake Stevens

column3: “I love this strain so much. It almost reminds me a little of headband! Super frosty and potent.”
“Another good smelling and tasting strain. I wouldn't mind having it again.”

“I have been smoking for about 40 years.It takes a lot to impress me and this strain certainly did just that.Sweet taste.I can usually detect in the taste if non organic pesticides where used.This one did not.After the second hit I was very happy and yet able to focus.The high lasted over 2 hours.Definately worth a try!


I purchased a gram of this at The Gallery in Parkland for 12.00.”

“this is a very good,potent strain.i enjoyed it a lot and will buy some more.a little skunky,diesel and lots of spice w/ a good taste.chunky,hard medium nugs,all u could want in a bud.took care of all my problems,anxiety,hi bp,stress,pain,insomnia etc.u can go to sleep or u can do as i like to do,gerat f/ wake and bake,but everyone is different!good smoke!grown by Learning Tree Cannabis Gardens.”
“great flavor and effect one of my favorites”

“Very potent Sativa, feel the gears of my mind grinding. Glad I took it easy, I didn't over stuff the bowl. Sweet smoke, reminds me of swisher sweets. was ready for bed, and now I've got some drifting energy”

“Secret Recipe is a great product. It left me calm, relaxed, a roused, mindful, peaceful, at ease, creative, and in a quizitive mood. Smell is a sweet fruity, but yet every once in a while it would have a chemical after smell. Taste is fruity, gasoline or earthy like a fresh wet dirt after it rained. Its a hearty flower it burned slowly.”
“This one was not one of my favorites, but it really is a good strain its just not my style.”

“Secret Recipe is like a Sour Diesel that I can smoke without anxiety. I agree with the reviewer who said it's similar to headband... it even gives me the head pressure. Overall, it's a strong and clear high.”
